contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week's guest is Nitasha Tiku, , co-editor of Valleywag, Silicon Valley's tech gossip rag.
title: Don't break my heart: This week's Silicon Tally
description: Our regular quiz looking back at the week's tech news.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, April 11, 2014
teaser: Our regular quiz looking back at the week's tech news.
